headline: BlackRock in talks to buy minority stake in Millennium, sources say
summary: (Reuters) -BlackRock is in early-stage talks with Millennium Management about a strategic tie-up that could involve acquiring a minority stake in the hedge fund, two sources familiar with the matter said.  The sources said it was not clear whether the talks would result in a deal, with one of them adding that the strategic rationale of a transaction was also unclear.  Millennium, founded by Israel Englander, manages roughly $70 billion.

headline: Millennium in Early Talks to Sell an Equity Stake to BlackRock
summary: (Bloomberg) -- BlackRock Inc. is in talks with Izzy Englander’s Millennium Management to take a minority stake in his $70 billion hedge fund, according to people familiar with the matter. headline: BlackRock: It Might Be Time To Trim This Beloved 'Compounder'
summary: Since Aug 2023, BlackRock outperformed S&P 500, gaining 38% vs. 33%, driven largely by multiple appreciation and some organic growth. Read more on BLK stock here.
